title: 12/15: Weekend Recap - The Best of Week 15 (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
What lessons did we learn in Week 15 (2:33)? Did we learn about how to approach players who are dealing with injuries or how to plan for garbage time? We get a little philosophical to start the show before we hit the big news (8:00) as an elite WR and an elite RB left with injuries and you need to replace them! Then it's on to the Best of Week 15 (12:00). Jameis Winston, Ryan Tannehill, Kenyan Drake, Breshad Perriman, Jonnu Smith, A.J. Brown and more ... The Unluckiest Player of Week 15 (24:40), an early look at the Waiver Wire (26:00) and some Winners and Losers (28:40) including the SF WRs as losers this week. Then we look at the MegaDuds (36:30) including Melvin Gordon, Julian Edelman, Robert Woods and Phillip Lindsay. What happened!? ... Recapping each game (42:00) with a "Believe it or Not" from Heath ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Lessons learned, biggest winners, biggest losers, an early look at the Waiver Wire and a recap of every game!
